results.content:
Slow and very basic. Spends a lot of time retyping code that is already pasted onto the bottom of the page.

Assumes pretty much no knowledge of HTML, JavaScript, CSS, jQuery.

results.content: Will follow up on review, but must say working with Tom has been great and helpful person.  I seriously don't think you can go wrong with any of his courses!  Tom, would love to see a VB.net advance course :)  Thanks and keep the courses coming!
